message.body: Hey! It's Emily from couchsurf. I was going to call you tomorrow but remembered it's your birthday. I still can tomorrow or on mon but I'm planning on getting to you around 8 on Monday. Is that alright with you two still? I don't want to impose if it won'
Perfect! I'll see you then and call you on the way. Enjoy your birthday!
Not unless you want to move it in the morning, it's metered. The streets north of spring garden are fine
I'm about 30-45 away. Can I park on your street?
Perfect. See ya in a bit.
Just FYI, it will be hard for me to check my phone all day, so may take me a while to text my friend at the mutter for you
Not a problem. I'll let you know at least an hour in advance. :) thanks again!
Awesome, that should be plenty of time
Finished at the penn. now going to walk through the garden towards muuter do whatever time works for her, I can be there.
K, I'll let her know yr way!
Should I ask for her? What's her name again?
Jen brown. She should be at the door, shaved head
Went there. Saw it. Fabulous!! Thanks so much :) should I meet you at the apartment around 630 for dinner then?
I will be home around 6:30, yea!
